软件包 org.athrun.android.framework

类摘要
ActivityElementType This class is used to check the element type.
ActivityUtils This class contains activity related methods.
AthrunDevice This class represents the device, and contains methods to operate device, such as press a key.
AthrunTestCase Extends this class to use Athrun.
ElementFinder  
LogConfigure Configure log4j
ScreenShot This class contains the methods of catching screen shot Because the screen shot file is saved on sdcard, please add permission: android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE in test apk's AndroidManifest.xml
ViewOperation This class contains MotionEvent methods.
 

枚举摘要
ViewOperation.Direction  
 

注释类型摘要
Failover  
Test for kelude use only?
